info.title: EquipmentWatch API
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Get models

parameters.name: product_code
parameters.description: Product code. Use following notation to search by muliple product codes: "CG,VG,SNG,RR,M&S,AG"

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Parameter is used to limit the number of results returned in the responce (max 1000). If limit is not specified, 1000 items will be returned in the result by default.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset is used to skip some number of items before beginning to return results. If offset is not specified, 0 items will be skipped in the result by default

get.summary: Get manufacturers

parameters.name: product_code
parameters.description: Product code. Use following notation to search by multiple product codes: "CG,VG,SNG,RR,M&S,AG"

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Parameter is used to limit the number of results returned in the responce (max 50). If limit is not specified, 50 items will be returned in the result by default.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset is used to skip some number of items before beginning to return results. If offset is not specified, 0 items will be skipped in the result by default
